seo.title: Autostop na Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim
seo.description: Dlaczego autostop jest ryzykowny i jakie są bezpieczniejsze alternatywy dla niskiego budżetu.

intro: Lean on the public transport network instead: carry validated tickets, plan backup routes, and keep emergency cash for taxis or porters if services stop.

sections.title: Safety reality
body: Coaches, buses, and scooters already share a single lane carved into the cliff. Drivers cannot see you in time and police will often move people along for their own safety.

faqs.q: Is hitchhiking legal on the Amalfi Coast?
